The easiest way to consult your doctor.

Make an appointment from the comfort of your home.

We work with Southeast Asia's leading hospital and medical associations.

Navigating the health tech ecosystem can be tough. Docquity has built a community where you can connect with the region's most trusted doctors.

Streamline your practice for maximum productivity.

Centralize all your practice, processes, tools, and files into one app. Connect with patients seamlessly, from the comfort of your home or clinic.

You do not need to download anything or do any install to join a Video Consultation call with your Doctor. It's easy and fast! Unlock more benefits and features if you download the Apps in your smartphone/ tablet.
You can simply do a 3 Way Video Call with a doctor alongwith your loved one from a remote location.
You get one-touch access to your Health Records anytime anywhere. Easily share your records when asked by your Doctor in just one click.
Now get automatic reminders for medications you need to take as prescribed by your Doctor on docquityclinic.
Your details and payments are completely secure with us. We offer 100% data privacy of your health records.
Conveniently pay your doctor's fee using Credit cards, Debit Cards and e-Wallets. You'll get an instant confirmation and receipt of the payment you make
Get access to all healthcare specialists.

Whether you need to consult with a GP, dentist, dermatologist, gynaecologists we are here to help.

Why Docquity

One app to support your healthcare career
Secure

We are serious about security, all of our chats are 256K SHA encrypted.

Private

Only verified doctors from medical societies and associations are allowed to use the app.

Trusted

We work with the region’s leading hospitals, medical associations and pharmaceutical companies to bring the entire ecosystem together.
